15:04:10//Setting up the due date and description-request type function se_SetRequestDueDate() { var glideDateTime = new GlideDateTime(current.variables.due_date); var desc = current.variables.description; var reqType = current.variables.request_type; var branch = current.variables.branch_name.getDisplayValue(); glideDateTime.addDays(1); glideDateTime.subtract(1000); current.due_date = glideDateTime; gs.log("current.due_date " + current.due_date , "se_SetRequestDueDate"); current.description = "Description:" + "\r" + desc + "\r*\r" + "Request Type:" + "\r" + reqType + "\r*\r" + "Branch Name:" + "\r" + branch + "\r*\r"; } se_SetRequestDueDate();c35ddef20a0a0ba96248a7090eccd518wf_activity88f84d0fdb350300f59974131f96191f1sys_variable_valuewuye@nih.gov2017-10-18 15:04:1000f84d0fdb350300f59974131f9619200wuye@nih.gov2017-10-18 15:04:10//Setting up the due date and description-request type function se_SetRequestDueDate() { var glideDateTime = new GlideDateTime(current.variables.due_date); var desc = current.variables.description; var reqType = current.variables.request_type; var branch = current.variables.branch_name.getDisplayValue(); glideDateTime.addDays(1); glideDateTime.subtract(1000); current.due_date = glideDateTime; gs.log("current.due_date " + current.due_date , "se_SetRequestDueDate"); current.description = "Description:" + "\r" + desc + "\r*\r" + "Request Type:" + "\r" + reqType + "\r*\r" + "Branch Name:" + "\r" + branch + "\r*\r"; }
